resources.string: The Alberta Workerâ€™s Health Centre and Calgary Workers Resource Centre provide free of charge help for people who have issues with health and safety and worker rights:

Services are free of charge. Provides a first point of contact for workers facing occupational health and safety issues in their workplace. Will provide support, public legal education, and referrals.
Provides free case work and public legal education program if you are having issues accessing your rights in your workplace
